tool_description: Internet of Things (Smart Device Product) Database - Get product information for smart/iot devices. See better documentation at https://iotdb.com/api/docs
name: IoTDb
title: IoTDb

api_list.name: readSingleItemsHardwareHardware
api_list.description: Retrieve a single hardware_hardware item by unique identifier.

optional_parameters.name: meta
optional_parameters.description: What metadata to return in the response.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Control what fields are being returned in the object.

api_list.name: getFile
api_list.description: Retrieve a single file by unique identifier.

optional_parameters.name: meta
optional_parameters.description: What metadata to return in the response.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Control what fields are being returned in the object.

storage.description: Where the file is stored. Either `local` for the local filesystem or the name of the storage adapter (for example `s3`).

filename_disk.description: Name of the file on disk. By default, Directus uses a random hash for the filename.

filename_download.description: How you want to the file to be named when it's being downloaded.

title.description: Title for the file. Is extracted from the filename on upload, but can be edited by the user.

folder.description: Virtual folder where this file resides in.

parent.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder. This allows for nested folders.

filesize.description: Size of the file in bytes.

width.description: Width of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

height.description: Height of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

duration.description: Duration of the file in seconds. Only applies to audio and video.

embed.description: Where the file was embedded from.

location.description: Where the file was created. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

tags.description: Tags for the file. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

metadata.description: IPTC, EXIF, and ICC metadata extracted from file

api_list.name: readSingleItemsFunctionsFunctions
api_list.description: Retrieve a single functions_functions item by unique identifier.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Control what fields are being returned in the object.

optional_parameters.name: meta
optional_parameters.description: What metadata to return in the response.

api_list.name: readItemsHardwareVideos
api_list.description: List the hardware_videos items.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: How many items to skip when fetching data.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Select items in collection by given conditions.

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter by items that contain the given search query in one of their fields.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects that are returned.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the returned items. `sort` is a CSV of fields used to sort the fetched items. Sorting defaults to ascending (ASC) order but a minus sign (` - `) can be used to reverse this to descending (DESC) order. Fields are prioritized by their order in the CSV. You can also use a ` ? ` to sort randomly.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Control what fields are being returned in the object.

optional_parameters.name: meta
optional_parameters.description: What metadata to return in the response.

storage.description: Where the file is stored. Either `local` for the local filesystem or the name of the storage adapter (for example `s3`).

filename_disk.description: Name of the file on disk. By default, Directus uses a random hash for the filename.

filename_download.description: How you want to the file to be named when it's being downloaded.

title.description: Title for the file. Is extracted from the filename on upload, but can be edited by the user.

folder.description: Virtual folder where this file resides in.

parent.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder. This allows for nested folders.

filesize.description: Size of the file in bytes.

width.description: Width of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

height.description: Height of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

duration.description: Duration of the file in seconds. Only applies to audio and video.

embed.description: Where the file was embedded from.

location.description: Where the file was created. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

tags.description: Tags for the file. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

metadata.description: IPTC, EXIF, and ICC metadata extracted from file

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: How to sort the returned items. `sort` is a CSV of fields used to sort the fetched items. You can also use a ` ? ` to sort randomly.

optional_parameters.description: How to sort the returned items. `sort` is a CSV of fields used to sort the fetched items. storage.description: Where the file is stored. Either `local` for the local filesystem or the name of the storage adapter (for example `s3`).

filename_disk.description: Name of the file on disk. By default, Directus uses a random hash for the filename.

filename_download.description: How you want to the file to be named when it's being downloaded.

title.description: Title for the file. Is extracted from the filename on upload, but can be edited by the user.

folder.description: Virtual folder where this file resides in.

parent.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder. This allows for nested folders.

filesize.description: Size of the file in bytes.

width.description: Width of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

height.description: Height of the file in pixels. Only applies to images.

duration.description: Duration of the file in seconds. Only applies to audio and video.

embed.description: Where the file was embedded from.

location.description: Where the file was created. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

tags.description: Tags for the file. Is automatically populated based on EXIF data for images.

metadata.description: IPTC, EXIF, and ICC metadata extracted from file
